text:
A little bird stole the show at Bernie Sanders’ rally in Portland on Friday. The Democratic candidate smiled and the audience of more than 10,000 went wild when a tiny bird joined Mr. Sanders at the podium.

Without missing a beat, the Vermont senator said even though it didn’t look like a dove, it must have been one that came to ask for world peace.

“I think there may be some symbolism in this,” said an amused Mr. Sanders, after the bird spent a few moments with him before flying off. “I know it doesn't look like it, but that bird is really a dove asking us for world peace… No more wars!” The video of Sanders and his feathered friend has gone viral on social media, with the hashtag ‘BirdieSanders’. — AP
title: ‘Birdie Sanders’ video goes viral
